document_data.name: Owlbear lodge
document_data.mainbody: The '''Owlbear lodge''', who were also called the '''Owlbear Berserkers''' or simply the '''Owlbears''', was a lodge of [[Rashemaar berserkers]] based in [[Rashemen]]'s capital of [[Immilmar]] as of the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Base of Operations: The Owlbears dwelt within the [[Owlbear Berserker Lodge]] located on the north side of Immilmar.
document_data.Activities: The Owlbears enjoyed challenging strangers to contests of drinking, fighting, and the use of [[spear]]s or [[bow]]s. Anyone who proved their worth during these challenges were invited into the lodge to feast with the berserkers. Owlbear berserkers took great pride in defeating creatures larger than themselves. Some of these berserkers wore spikes on their [[armor]] to harm their foes.
document_data.Organization: The leader of the Owlbear lodge as of the {{YearlinkName|1367}}, was [[Ythar Wolfmaster]].
